name: Stripped Back Portfolio
description: When a user clicks the toggle, I want the theme on the page to change and the toggle to change with it. I added the imported setTheme() function and setTogClass() from the local state to a handleOnClick function. You can see where it is passed to the clickable part of the toggle in the JSX above.
